default.import: Upload file with positions. Previously entered data will be updated.

Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.title: Invalid file format. Choose the file with the extension ".xlsx".
The file does not match the template. Possible reasons:
Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.text:
• The file does not contain the specifications of the items
• The request has been updated and your proposal is out of date
• The table columns or customer data have been changed
Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.download: Download the proposal template and upload it again.

Process.Light.Import.Positions.FileHasEr.title: Items with errors are not loaded. Correct the errors and upload again.
Process.Light.Import.Positions.FileHasEr.download: Download a file with error descriptions

forbidden.title: Information is not available right now

current.tooltip: Proposal price in the base currency of the request

previous.title: Previous
previous.tooltip: Price of a previously submitted proposal

timer.title: Time left
timer.tooltip: Before the end of the acceptance of bid.

reference_price.title: Price change step
reference_price.tooltip: Step by which you can change the offer price

currency.invalid: The currency is not included in the list of currencies specified in the rules of the request

vat.invalid: The specified VAT rate is not included in the catalog

availability.invalid: The owner requires the presence of all positions

count.deviation_in_request: Deviation from the quantity in the request is not allowed
count.deviation_in_position: Deviations from the quantity in the request are not allowed, or indicate "Out of stock"
count.less_or_equal_zero: If the position is out of stock, specify "Out of stock" or indicate the quantity
count.greater_than_zero: If there is no position, specify quantity = 0
count.not_equal_to_position: Deviation from the quantity in the request

price.equal_to_zero_count_gte_zero: The price is not specified. If there is no position, specify "Out of stock"
price.start_price_auction: Your unit price in {{currency}} ({{price}} {{currency}}) below the minimum price per unit specified by the Customer ({{startPrice}} {{currency}})
price.start_price_reduction: Your unit price in {{currency}} ({{price}} {{currency}}) exceeds the maximum price per unit specified by the Customer ({{startPrice}} {{currency}})
price.refer_price_step: Your unit price in {{currency}} ({{price}} {{currency}}) violates the price change step specified by the Customer ({{rule}})
